StringTable.Label: MinisterExploration_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Exploration

StringTable.Label: MinisterExploration_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Exploration [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Manages our travel to the edge of the galaxy.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases our Moves and Range based on the Diligence of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterTechnology_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Technology

StringTable.Label: MinisterTechnology_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Technology [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Manages the research across our empire.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Adds an additional Technology Slot and increases Research based on the Intelligence of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterDefense_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Defense

StringTable.Label: MinisterDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Defense [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Makes sure our fleet and colonies are secure.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases ship Hit Points and Resistance based on the Resolve of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterCulture_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Culture

StringTable.Label: MinisterCulture_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Culture [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Spreading our influence throughout the galaxy.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases Influence based on the Social of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterFinance_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Finance

StringTable.Label: MinisterFinance_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Finance [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Provides access to new trade opportunities.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlock the [HS=HS_Bazaar]Galactic Bazaar[/HS] and reduces Maintenance based on the Intelligence of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterProduction_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Production

StringTable.Label: MinisterProduction_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Production [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Improves production across our empire.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases Manufacturing based on the Diligence of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterBiology_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Health

StringTable.Label: MinisterBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Health [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Focuses on the health of our citizens.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases Growth based on the Diligence skill of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterColony_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Colonization

StringTable.Label: MinisterColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Colonization [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]By listening to the needs of citizens on all out worlds we can improve their Approval.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases Approval on all Core Worlds except our Homeworld based on the Social skill of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Tourism

StringTable.Label: MinisterTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Tourism [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]If we can draw travelers to our worlds they will enhance them, and our economy.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increases the [HS=HS_Tourism]Tourism[/HS] of our worlds based on the Social of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MinisterCrime_Name
StringTable.String: Minister of Justice

StringTable.Label: MinisterCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: Minister of Justice [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The security of our citizens, and their possessions, is a primary responsibility of a government.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reduces the Crime on your colonies based on the Diligence of the assigned Minister[/COLOR]
